p.6: Are you seeking an opportunity to work with an evolutionary tech startup? This expansive startup is looking for an experienced Machine Learning Engineer that is passionate on the technical and client-side.
p.10: This expansive startup prides itself on utilizing mass amounts of data. There=E2=80=99s a huge opportunity for growth in this company as you will be working hands-on with passionate individuals.
p.15: As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will collaborate with like-minded and driven individuals to develop models and relationships with stakeholders. Your responsibilities will include:

li: Employing exploratory data analysis skills (such as numpy and pandas). and statistical learning techniques (such as Python) to produce models.
li.1: Work closely with cross-functional teams to develop machine learning infrastructure.

li: Educated to a B.S. in a numerate discipline (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Physics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related field).
li.2: 5+ Years of Industry Experience as a Machine Learning Engineer.
li.3: Extensive experience with Machine Learning Pipelines
li.4: Advanced commercial programming skills in Python, ability to code and model from scratch.

p.35: Please register your interest by sending your Resume to Ridah Azhar via the Apply link on this page.
